description: This is the main entry point of a Flutter application for a personal notes organizer. It sets up the main widget tree, routing, theme, and provides a stubbed database and state management provider.

classes.name: NotesListScreen
classes.description: A placeholder widget displaying a screen with a gradient app bar, a floating action button for adding notes, and a message indicating that the app is being generated.

classes.name: _PlaceholderScreen
classes.description: A generic placeholder widget for distanced routes, displaying a simple 'Coming soon...' message.

classes.name: _NotFoundScreen
classes.description: A widget displayed when navigation fails to match a route, showing a 'Route not found' message.

classes.name: NotesDb
classes.description: A stub class mimicking a database service with an async initialization method, to be replaced with a real database implementation.

classes.name: NotesProvider
classes.description: A stub ChangeNotifier class acting as a placeholder for notes state management, to be fleshed out later.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Asynchronous main entry point initializing Flutter bindings, the database, and running the root widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method in the MyApp widget constructing the widget tree with theme, routing, and state providers.
